description: Detects the use of various CLI utilities exfiltrating data via web requests
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Data Exfiltration Activity Via CommandLine Tools
query: ((((process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\cmd.exe") AND process.command_line.text:("*Invoke\-WebRequest*" OR "*iwr\ *" OR "*wget\ *" OR "*curl\ *") AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-ur*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-me*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-b*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ POST\ *")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*\\curl.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*\-\-ur*" AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \-d\ *" OR "*\ \-\-data\ *")))) AND ((process.command_line.text:("*ToBase64String*" OR "*whoami*" OR "*nltest*" OR "*ifconfig*" OR "*hostname*" OR "*net\ view*" OR "*qprocess*" OR "*netstat*" OR "*systeminfo*" OR "*tasklist*" OR "*sc\ query*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*type\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ >\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ C\:\\*"))))
